p: The oil extracted by hydrodistillation from leaves of plants grown in various locations in Sardinia contained mostly Î±-pinene (generally 30.0%, but reaching in one case a maximum of 59.5%), 1,8-cineole (ranging from 15.9 to 41.7% with an average of 28.8%), and limonene (ranging from 5.2 to 29.8% with an average of 17.5%) as the most abundant components [ 40].
